name: document-gallery
description: Display non-images (and images) in gallery format on a page or post.
author: Dan Rossiter

scripts.build: npm run check-version && wp-scripts build && npm run minify
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:js: terser src/assets/js/admin.js -o src/assets/js/admin.min.js -c -m && terser src/assets/js/gallery.js -o src/assets/js/gallery.min.js -c -m && terser src/assets/js/media_manager.js -o src/assets/js/media_manager.min.js -c -m
